title: 由多位來自世界各地的Remixers提供12首 Depeche Mode 的Remix，支持香港市民反送中運動

replies.msg:
由多位來自世界各地的 Remixers提供12首 Depeche Mode 混音歌曲，支持香港市民反送中運動。我們不是孤單的，香港人加油!

Free Download: Depeche Mode - Welcome To My Home (Pray For Hong Kong)

Artist: Depeche Mode
Album: Welcome To My Home
Date: June 2019
Time: 77mins 07secs

01 Enjoy the Silence [In the Dark Remix]
02 Sister Of Night [Wake Up Lounge]
03 Where's The Revolution [A Trip Through The Revolution Remix]
04 Everything Counts [Dominatrix Remix]
05 Dream On [David Dieu Remix]
06 Waiting For The Night [Darkness RMX]
07 Precious [World Violation RemiX]
08 The Love Thieves [Eladsof Remix]
09 Sea Of Sin [Island Remix]
10 No Disco [Fdieu ReBoot Mode]
11 Welcome To My World [My Home Mix]
12 Heroes [DmtrX Rmx]
